column1: Primula was the youngest child of [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Mirabella Took]]. She married [[Drogo Baggins]], with whom she had one child, [[Frodo Baggins
column4: 1380}}, she and her husband drowned when they went boating on the [[Baranduin

column2: Primula]] is a genus of the [[wikipedia:Primulaceae
column3: primrose family]] of plants. It is the Latin name of the primrose and means "little first" because it flowers in early spring.
